description_top: Hebrew Bible: Prophets with Writings and a commentary.
title: Hebrew Bible: Prophets with Writings and a commentary.
description: Prophets from 1 Samuel 25:2. Writings on the margins, from Proverbs 10:19, Daniel, Ezra-Nehemiah and Chronicles. Commentary on the side margin from 1 Samuel 25:8 to the beginning of Isaiah. Biblical text ends on f. 147 (I)r, immediately followed by calendars (ff. 147(i)-165). On f. 166, Megilat Antiokhos, incomplete.
